name: Vectra Cognito Detect Splunk SOAR
description: Vectra AI is the leader in AI-driven threat detection and response for hybrid and multi-cloud enterprises. Organizations worldwide rely on Vectra to stay ahead of modern cyber-attacks. The Vectra AI App enables the security operations team to consume Vectra's Quadrant User Experience signal and take appropriate action whether automated, semi-automated, or manual, using Splunk SOAR

entity_tags.description: Comma-separated entity tags to filter entities for ingestion

certainty.description: Poll entity which certainty score is greater than equal to given value (0-100)

threat.description: Poll entity which threat score is greater than equal to given value (0-100)

on_poll_start_time.description: Start time for manual polling and first run of schedule polling (Valid formats are YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ or YYYY-MM-DD)

manual_max_allowed_container.description: Max entities to ingest for manual polling in a given cycle

schedule_max_allowed_container.description: Max entities to ingest for schedule/interval polling in a given cycle

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
actions.verbose:
This action will check the status of the Vectra API endpoint and test connectivity of Splunk SOAR to the Vectra instance.
The action validates the provided asset configuration parameters. Based on the response from the API call, the appropriate success and failure message will be displayed when the action gets executed.

actions.description: Get all the details of a detection

example_values: This is the first time this host has been seen on the network.
The detection has been successfully fetched

actions.description: Get all the details of an entity

example_values: This is the first time this host has been seen on the network.

actions.description: List all active detections present in an entity

example_values: This is the first time this host has been seen on the network.

note.description: Note which needs to be added in entity

actions.description: Remove note of a specific entity

actions.verbose: Note: If the 'tags_list' parameter contains tags provided as comma-separated values, each tag exceeding 100 characters in length will be trimmed down to 100 characters.

example_values: The tags has been added successfully
The tags has been removed successfully

outcome.description: Outcome title like Benign True Positive, Malicious True Positive, False Positive(Custom outcome is allowed)

actions.description: Ingest entities from Vectra using Vectra API
